turn.0: ELI5:Why do restaurants ask how you like your steak cooked?
turn.1: Some fishes you can eat raw. Not all of them. Is always better to eat it cooked. Pregnant women and -3 yo children should not eat any raw fish (doctors recomendation). It's risky.
turn.2: But I heard that it isn’t recommended to eat rare steak if you’re a pregnant women as well...
turn.3: Yeah, pregnant women can't eat raw meat, but you refered to sashimi and the sushi types of fish, which are prohibited aswel
turn.4: Yeah, but my point was that fish can be eating raw, but restaurants don’t ask me how well I want salmon cooked, as an example.
turn.5: And pork and chiken are eaten only cooked. No other ways.
